synopsis.text: Animation enthusiasts are in for a treat with this unique action-packed anime, part of the Nexon Animation Project. Originally intended as an adaptation of a popular PC game, the series introduces viewers to a world where extraordinary students possess animal-like abilities and characteristics. These gifted individuals attend a specialized school, where they hone their powers to protect humanity from destructive monsters, offering an engaging blend of fantasy and adventure. While the anime's production was ultimately canceled, fans can still enjoy the released promotional videos and opening sequences, which showcase the thrilling world and captivating characters that await within.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
